blog.name: dailymarvelheroes
blog.title: Daily Marvel Heroes
blog.description: Welcome to Daily Marvel Heroes! This blog is dedicated to characters in the Marvel universe, whether it's live-action, comics or animation. You can find gifs, updates and various resources about the universe on this page. We track #dailymarvelheroes, in case you wanted us to check out your edits!

summary: Jude Law praises 'Captain Marvel,' says Brie Larson is 'magnificent'
title: Jude Law praises 'Captain Marvel,' says Brie Larson is 'magnificent'
excerpt: Want some early — and encouraging — words on Captain Marvel? We recently asked Jude Law about his role in…
description: “Yes, it’s been reported I’m playing Mar-Vell,” Law said. “I’m not going to confirm or deny that. It’s been a very interesting experience. Brie Larson has approached it with incredible dedication and devotion. She really turned out a wonderful performance — fun and feisty and smart. I think she’s going to be absolutely magnificent.”

reblog.comment: “Yes, it’s been reported I’m playing Mar-Vell,” Law said. “I’m not going to confirm or deny that. It’s been a very interesting experience. Brie Larson has approached it with incredible dedication and devotion. She really turned out a wonderful performance — fun and feisty and smart. I think she’s going to be absolutely magnificent.”

trail.content_raw: “Yes, it’s been reported I’m playing Mar-Vell,” Law said. “I’m not going to confirm or deny that. It’s been a very interesting experience. Brie Larson has approached it with incredible dedication and devotion. She really turned out a wonderful performance — fun and feisty and smart. I think she’s going to be absolutely magnificent.”
trail.content: “Yes, it’s been reported I’m playing Mar-Vell,” Law said. “I’m not going to confirm or deny that. It’s been a very interesting experience. Brie Larson has approached it with incredible dedication and devotion. She really turned out a wonderful performance — fun and feisty and smart. I think she’s going to be absolutely magnificent.”

summary: The Marvel Studios ad campaign train has been moving non-stop for so long, it's so weird that Captain Marvel is the next movie...
body: The Marvel Studios ad campaign train has been moving non-stop for so long, it’s so weird that Captain Marvel is the next movie to come out and we have literally seen nothing from it yet.

title: Blog: "Shazam! Power of Hope"
body:
Blog: “Shazam! Power of Hope”

CLICK ON THIS IMAGE

This is not a review but a recommendation. STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING RIGHT NOW and BUY THIS BOOK.

There has been SO much confusion as of late with the Shazam! movie coming out, and people not really understanding the classic Captain Marvel character, or what he’s about. There is no better introduction to who Captain Marvel truly is than Shazam! Power of Hope.

You’ll get the…

summary: Jude Law Calls Brie Larson's Captain Marvel "Wonderful"
title: Jude Law Calls Brie Larson's Captain Marvel "Wonderful"
body:
Jude Law Calls Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel “Wonderful”

While dodging a question about who he plays in next Spring’s Captain Marvel, actor Jude Law offered plenty of compliments to the film’s headlining star, Brie Larson.

“Brie Larson has approached it with incredible dedication and devotion,” he told Entertainment Weekly. “She really turned out a wonderful performance — fun and feisty and smart. I think she’s going to be absolutely magnificent.”

A…

View On WordPress
